IMU.name: How exactly do you get out of here?
IMU.desc: Today on Friday, July 13th, your worst nightmare happens. You're trapped inside the Indiana Memorial Union during your summer vacation! You need to escape this hell before you waste this perfectly good Friday.

BOOKSTORE.name: Indiana University's Bookstore
BOOKSTORE.desc: You're standing in the empty bookstore, lost more now than ever. Where do you go next?

COMPUTERLAB.name: Computer Lab
COMPUTERLAB.desc: Ah, of course. The Computer Lab. I'm starting to think you don't want to go home.
